job.title: Senior Software Development Engineer
job.description: Are you interested in working in realtime highly concurrent event driven systems that interface with real world devices Are you driven to build highly resilient systems that continue to operate even through unanticipated realworld interactions If all of this interests you then you are likely a great fit for a Sr Software Development Engineer for WESRoboticsltbrgtltbrgtAs a Senior Software Engineer in the WESRobotics team you will beltbrgtltulgtltligtWorking with a broad range of devices and services on the warehouse floor designed to improve the quality of life of the operators and efficiency and operations of the warehouseltligtltligtWorking with a highly concurrent event driven architecture built on microservices and running on KubernetesltligtltligtWork with our robotics system that is rolling out to our fulfillment centersltligtltligtProblem solving on optimizing paths guiding realtime robotics routes routing orders to operator stations to reduce robot travel times and increase the overall throughput of the systemltligtltligtand much moreltligtltulgtYou will be working with a skilled team of engineers who have a passion for collaboration problem solving and highly scalable realtime systems If this all sounds fun you are a perfect fit for our team You must haveltbrgtltulgtltligtBachelors in CS or related degree  experienceltligtltligtStrong background with NET Core C Kubernetes  Docker OOA  OOD Relationalnonrelational DBs REST API Connection Pool  Data ReaderltligtltligtStrong experience with Distributed Systems Microservices and SOAltligtltligtDDD and event driven architectures a plusltligtltulgtMOltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAbout IHerbltbrgtltstronggtiHerb is a leading global ecommerce retailer with an emphasis on providing an exceptional selection of nutritional and wellness products for the past 25 years With over 30000 products shipped to over 180 countries we provide the best overall value for natural products through an innovative and efficient supply chain processltbrgtltbrgtOur teams have a strong sense of commitment and pride in their work which has allowed us to grow even during the recent pandemic At iHerb our purpose is to empower people to enhance their health happiness and wellbeing  that starts with valuing our team members by providing a positive work environment with competitive benefits Our five shared values unite our team members across the globe and provide a stable foundation These values speak to who we are the culture were building and how every single team member contributes to our larger company visionltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtiHerbs Shared ValuesltbrgtltstronggtFocus on the Customerltbrgtltulgtltligt Empower Our Peopleltligtltligt Be Entrepreneurial ampamp Pivot Quicklyltligtltligt Embrace Diversity ampamp Inclusionltligtltligt Strive for SimplicityltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtIHerb BenefitsltbrgtltstronggtAt iHerb we are dedicated to offering programs designed to help our employees and their families stay healthy live well and plan for the financial future Built on a strong foundation our programs provide options and upgrades with flexibility iHerb covers 100 of the associated cost for medical benefitsltligtltligtDental and Vision benefitsltligtltligtSafe Harbor 401k  company match 100 of the first 6 of the employees contributionltligtltligtCompanypaid Term Life InsuranceltligtltligtShort and Long Term DisabilityltligtltligtFlexible Spending Account for qualifying expensesltligtltligtPet InsuranceltligtltligtVoluntary Supplemental BenefitsltligtltligtEducation Reimbursement ProgramsltligtltligtProfessional Development and Job TrainingltligtltligtWellness Programs with opportunity to earn up to 300 per yearltligtltulgtWe strive for innovation targeted at delivering a customercentric experience while transforming the online shopping experience We change direction and define ourselves in the idea that individually we are incredible but united our growth is infinite and paramount to our success iHerb strives to be the global industry leaderltbrgtltbrgtiHerb is an Equal
